name: Alena Xenakis
description: Alena Xenakis,also known asAlex, is a character inCyberpunk 2077:Phantom Liberty. Alena grew up in the slums of theLos AngelesMetroplex, and following her dream, she became an aspiringbraindanceactress. Unknown to her, the braindance studio she joined was a front for theFederal Intelligence Agency. Her formidable acting skills impressed them enough that she was recruited bySolomon Reed. Ever since, she has worked with the FIA in many covert operations, becoming a talented shapeshifter. At some point after theUnification War, Alex was placed inDogtownas an undercover agent.
